references.paper_title: Fully convolutional networks for semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced the foundational Fully Convolutional Networks (FCNs) architecture, which is a cornerstone of many modern semantic segmentation methods.

references.paper_title: Rethinking atrous convolution for semantic image segmentation
references.reason: This paper significantly improved the performance of semantic segmentation by revisiting atrous convolutions, enabling better handling of multi-scale contexts.

references.paper_title: Masked-attention mask transformer for universal image segmentation
references.reason: This work introduced the Mask2Former model, showcasing the effective use of masked attention and transformers for achieving superior performance in semantic segmentation.
This paper proposed the Pyramid Scene Parsing Network (PSPNet), which effectively integrates multi-scale context information for improved accuracy in semantic segmentation.

references.paper_title: Docnet: Dual-domain optimized class-aware network for remote sensing image segmentation
references.reason: This is a recent paper that made contributions to remote sensing image segmentation, using dual-domain class-aware networks, and is directly relevant to the current paper's topic and methodology.
